parameters.formDescription: Quickly configure your Telegram bot webhook with this free tool. No data is stored - your information is processed in real-time for immediate webhook setup.

parameters.content:
## Form Input Collection

This node creates a user-friendly web form to collect webhook configuration data:

**Input Fields:**
- Bot API Token (from @BotFather)
- Webhook URL (your n8n endpoint)

**Features:**
- Input validation
- Placeholder examples
- Privacy notice
- Mobile-responsive design

**Security:** No data is stored - all processing happens in real-time.

## URL Construction Logic

This node builds the proper Telegram API URL for webhook configuration:

**Process:**
- Constructs Telegram setWebhook API URL
- URL-encodes the webhook parameter
- Creates masked token for logging
- Validates URL format

**API Endpoint:**
`https://api.telegram.org/bot{TOKEN}/setWebhook?url={WEBHOOK_URL}`

**Error Prevention:** Automatic URL encoding prevents common configuration issues.

## Telegram API Redirect

This node completes the webhook configuration by redirecting to Telegram:

**Final Step:**
- Redirects user to generated API URL
- Telegram processes webhook configuration
- Returns success/error response
- User sees confirmation in browser

**Result:** Webhook is immediately active and ready to receive updates from Telegram.

**Note:** User must be logged into their Telegram account for authorization.
